alert.note: Alert for Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 2:31PM EDT until July 09 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN MECKLENBURG COUNTY... At 230 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Boydton, or 12 miles southeast of Chase City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... La Crosse around 310 PM EDT. South Hill around 315 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Rogers Corner, Beechwood, Bracey, Keats, John H Kerr Dam, North View, Eppes Fork, Baskerville, Palmer Springs and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
